post.body: Spent today in bed feeling sick. I hate when I have to cancel fun plans due to illness, more than I hate daytime TV.
Watched five True Blood episodes tonight. Vampire porn is addictive.
Cleaning and watching my stories.
Uploaded a photo of the smiley sky to Flickr - http://tinyurl.com/6q6cun - I love how the camera did face recognition when I took the photo.
Went outside and looked at the smiley face. Naww cute. And good to know @somegen isn't on acid.
Thinking @somegen is on acid, he just told me to go look at the smiley face in the sky.
Making mini pizzas for dinner.
Loading up lemon party on the iphones in the telstra shop.
Waiting to have my monthly b12 shot. Two of the nurses are fighting over wound management, the pt looks bored.
Going to bed with a headache.
Finally off the boat and going home.
Watching old drunk people dance to Katy Perry on the boat. Oh dear.
Looking at the christmas lights on the back of the boat. There is bad music and disco lights inside.
Thanking the sneaky folk who brought alcohol onboard. I might marry them!
About to embark on a non-alcoholic boat cruise. This should be interesting.
Hoping I have time to hunt down some food. I'll be little Miss Grumpypants if I don't.
Almost walked into a closed door. You nearly had me, door.
Watching The IT Crowd before sleepytime.
Looking at @caseymckinnon's headshots and trying to pick my favourtie - http://tinyurl.com/6mxlxm - it's so hard, they're all gorgeous!
Waiting along with @Moist for someone to towel me off with their tongue. I'm very demanding and lazy today.
Watching House and Top Gear.
Thinking that you should be able to hire cuddles, you can hire sex and bouncy castles, why not cuddles?
Watching an old black and white movie. I wonder if the walls are red or blue.
Watching Back To The Future. Decided to stay home and rest tonight.
Craving choc-chip muffins. Might have to make some tomorrow.
Not tonight, @grum dearest. I'm sure @noodlez would love to be the crouton in you're awesome salad tonight, he loves you're dressing.
Jealous of the @leetbix boys and their Rock Band playing.
Moving files and trying to decide what to do tonight.
Looking through the christmas stuff. Found my 'ho bloody ho' christmas hat, I should have worn it on the christmas cruise.
Having a major what the fuck moment right now. Apparently my blog does not require wp-admin files to work.
Received an email from a company wanting to do a 'cash for tweets' deal with me. Advertising ruins every medium.
Haz fever and nuasea. Time for a nap.
Listening to some drunk kids out the front have a swearing war. What is a 'pussy fudger'? Wait... I don't think I want to know.
Woken up by nightmares and a stomach ache.
Watching Top Gear, reading Science Daily and eating dinner. It's interesting how my brain can multitask well but forget my PIN.
Reading about speculations that time travelers may have tampered with LHC - http://tinyurl.com/6ewdk6 - great scott!
Taking my cute self to bed.
Did a google image search on a friend with safe search off... never really noticed how many naked photos friend has online.
Probably should stop using my hot Macbook as a heatpack for my tummy and go find a real heatpack.
Not friends with Monday.
Asked to move on by security, our standing and talking was against the rules.
Laughing at the girls who keep swooning and giggling, they clapped and when Bella and Edward kissed.
Amused by the fangirls who go crazy every time Edward comes on screen.
Seeing Twilight with @somegen, @lulu and @hesa.
Getting ready to go out. I can haz energy?
Watching House and The Hills instead of sleeping. I'm hardcore.
Sending more email that's not about boobs. What's with me tonight?
Sent an email to a friend with the subject "An email not about boobs (which is odd, I really tried to add boobs but it couldn't be done!)"
Am 42% gay according to the gay survey , I could be more gay if I tried harder. Link thanks to @grum - http://tinyurl.com/1xgc
Having a 'naww' moment after noticing that @phonakins nominated me for @violetblue's Sexiest Geek of 2009 list - http://tinyurl.com/5nbhfg
Watching The Office before sleepytime.
Hot and bothered. Not in a good way, in a sunburnt and annoyed kind of way.
OH: "Your mum is pretty outgoing, and by outgoing I mean she's a slut."
At @cuzza's place, everyone is playing Lips and I'm wearing a head crab - http://twitpic.com/sg35
Drinking my alkeyhol and talking about cocks. PTUB is going well.
OH: "I've got cum in my hair!"
Taking photos of everyone enjoying @cuzza's penises.
Heading to the PTUB BBQ with @somegen and @grum.
Bringing fruit salad, chicken and turkey, soft drink and lots of water to the PTUB BBQ. Should bring a bottle of wine?
Thinking I need an upgrade, I can't remember anything lately. Maybe sleep will help.
Uploaded photos from last nights Twilight adeventure - http://tinyurl.com/6e72oq
Watching my stories and eating a late dinner.
Feeling sad after hearing that Bettie Page died today. RIP gorgeous lady - http://bettiepage.com
Thinking @grum is silly, I'm going to the PTUB BBQ of course! - http://tinyurl.com/OMGWTFPTUBBQ
Doing a few loads of washing before going out to buy foods for tomorrows BBQ.
Going to do bed. Naww, bed is so cuddly and warm.
Finally home. My phone died a few hours ago so I was Twitterless, oh noes!
Heading into the city with @grum, @somegen, @hesa and @lu_u for foods and drinkies.
Oops! I meant @lu_lu, sorry @lulu. I didn't mean to make you out as someone who likes being spanked.
Watching @lulu spank @hesa with drum sticks.
Trying on dresses at Dotti. The girls next door are gossiping, apparently Ben slept with Emma, who is a total whore.
Some kid just got owned when trying to steal a girls bag. Random guy in the crowd chased him down and grabbed him.
Going shopping soon, hoping it won't be too crazy.
OH: "Let me show you photos of my pussy...I think they're still on my camera from last night."
Finally home. Had fun with Callum and Tracey today. He's nearly walking and talking, he totally felt me up at one point though, typical guy.
Spent the day with Callum and Tracey. He's gone to sleep so it's grown up gossip time.
Just noticed my phone has been frozen for the last few hours.
Killed my alarm clock by accidentally spilling a drink on it. Apparently alarm clocks aren't waterproof.
Trying to resist the urge to eat candy canes while decorating the Christmas tree with them. They're like crack. JUST ONE MORE HIT, MAN!
Forgot to Tweet about the PTUB Christmas BBQ photos last night - http://tinyurl.com/59rb74
Listening to the latest Leetbix while I wait for photos to upload to Flickr - http://is.gd/bLxi
Has bad hay fever, took some antihistamines but they're not helping.
Loving that my Mother has finally figured out SMS. Next step is to teach her that 'r' and 'u' are not real words.
Looking at photos from the PTUB BBQ. Found photo evidence of the previously Tweeted swinging with @lu_lu - http://tinyurl.com/65qzyn
Thinking everyone is perverted, I was innocently sucking on a candy cane - http://tinyurl.com/5p3kn3
Sucking on something hard and yummy.
Doing some christmas shopping. Saw some cute shoes too.
Has bruises on my hips from swinging with @lu_lu yesterday.
Relaxing on swing. I haz major headache and sore throat.
Spent the last few hours trying to find a costume for Tracey's 21st. Epic fail.
Having chinese food for lunch. Om nom nom.
Feeling feverish and sick. Hoping a good nights rest and some vitamins will help.
OH: "You rules and I love you and your boobs. Also whisky. In the pants. Bananas."
Chilling on swing with laptop, internets, ipod and drinkie. Need xbox, foods (I can smell BBQ) and massage for this to be heaven.
Uploaded photos of said swinging - http://tinyurl.com/9le6rj - laptop + swing = awesomeness!
Swinging. Took me ages to setup.
Going to bed with a headache. If a big bug eats my brains during the night it's totally @Devar's fault.
Chatted with my neighbour about the shark attack today, she knew him well and was quite upset - http://tinyurl.com/9lowcu
Putting together an outdoor table and chairs for my Mother.
Eating leftover apple crumble and replying to emails.
Waiting for Doctor Who to download. Hurry the bloody hell up, internets!!! (And yes, three exclamation marks were necessary.)
Visited my Dad on his boat at the marina. Exchanged christmas gifts and chatted for a bit as the sun went down.
Purchased 2 pairs of shoes, a dress, earrings and headbands at the sales today. Totally felt up the Macbook's on display too.
Nearly got run over by crazy woman with a trolly at the boxing day sales.
Thinking @lu_lu could never show too much. The more the merrier!
Showered and tucked up in bed. Watching 'Zack & Miri Make a Porno' before sleepytime.
Eating christmas dinner and drinking bubbles. Om nom nom.
Opened the presents, Santa loves me! I got Top Gear DVD's (1.0 and 2.0), earrings, cupcake stand, gift cards, lip gloss, perfume, a came ...
